S

save() - Method in class ControllerMain
Main core saving method, called when there is an active file to save to.
saveAsDeck() - Method in class ControllerMain
Ask the user for the location of where they want to save.
saveDeck() - Method in class ControllerMain
Save or Save As the current deck.
setBackData(String) - Method in class ModelFlashCard
Setter for the String data of the back of the card.
setColor(Color) - Method in class ControllerMain
Used by ViewEditCardColorButton to only change color but not JTextPane text.
setColor(Color) - Method in class ViewFlashCardJPanel
Sets the color of the current card being displayed.
setColorLock(boolean) - Method in class ControllerMain
Setter method.
setColors(Color) - Method in class ModelFlashCard
Setter for the color of the card.
setDeckTitle(String) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Sets deck title string in the top of this panel when painted.
setFrameTitleUnsaved() - Method in class ControllerMain
Adds a "*" to the title if changes were made and not saved.
setFrontData(String) - Method in class ModelFlashCard
Setter for the String data of the front of the card.
setIsChanged(boolean) - Method in class ControllerMain
Setter method used by other methods and class to determine if changes were made.
setMouseHover(boolean) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Called by other classes to let this panel know that a mouse is hovering over it.
setNewDecks(ModelFlashCardAllDecks) - Method in class ControllerMain
Sets the current deck to the deck specified.
setSameColorCheckBox(boolean) - Method in class ControllerMain
If the state of the checkBox is checked, then makes all new card have the same color.
setSelected(boolean) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Called by other classes to tell this panel that it is selected.
setText(String, boolean, int) - Method in class ViewFlashCardJPanel
Sets the text field of the current card with html code.
switchToMainDeck() - Method in class ControllerMain
Called every time the user clicks on the main deck pile.
switchToMemorized() - Method in class ControllerMain
Called every time the user clicks on the Memorized Deck pile.
